summary: An ordinance relating to the use of the public highways and all other places of the City of Seattle open to the public for the use of vehicles, and providing for the issuance of permits in special cases for operation of vehicles exceeding a certain weight, length and width, and specifying standards for the issuance of such permits and the execution and delivery of bonds to save the city harmless thereon; imposing certain duties upon the Superintendent of Street and Sewers, and amending Sections 89 and 91 of Ordinance No. 46765.
